abstract: Why is Lytro willing to miss the holiday shopping season with its hot camera?
snippet: Why is Lytro willing to miss the holiday shopping season with its hot camera?
lead_paragraph: Lytro, the new camera that Sam Grobart wrote about on the Gadgetwise blog, is going to get a lot of buzz in the coming months. It lets you refocus a photo after it is taken, a technology that leaves everyone who sees it in awe.

headline.main: Lytro, and the Danger in Missing Christmas
